summary: Documentary film exploring the rise of Club Kid legend Michael Alig and his fall in 1996 when he murdered his drug dealer/roommate Angel Melendez.
cast: Michael Alig|Gitsie|James St. James|Keoki|Eric Bernat|Michael Musto|Al D. Rodriguez|Walt Paper|Elke Alig|Brooke Humphries|Kenny Kenny|Brian McCauley|Andre Melendez|Johnny Melendez|Richie Rich|Ida Slapter|Jenny Talia|Lahoma Van Zandt|Amanda Lepore|Vicky Ruane
title: Party Monster
